info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 2:02PM MST until December 31 at 11:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...In Utah, Arches/Grand Flat. In Colorado, Grand Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
